name: Dinari SPTE
description: The Dinari SPTE dShares token (SPTE.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the SP Funds S&P Global Technology ETF (NYSE Arca: SPTE). This ETF is designed to provide exposure to global technology companies that comply with Shariah principles, focusing on firms with robust financial health and low leverage. Each SPTE.d token is fully backed by a corresponding SPTE ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, SPTE.d offers investors access to a diversified portfolio of Shariah-compliant technology stocks, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
